parameters.name: Application
parameters.description: The application to get. Specify either the application name or the application ID.

parameters.name: Environment
parameters.description: The environment to get. Specify either the environment name or the environment ID.

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: The configuration to get. Specify either the configuration name or the configuration ID.

parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The clientId parameter in the following command is a unique, user-specified ID to identify the client for the configuration. This ID enables AppConfig to deploy the configuration in intervals, as defined in the deployment strategy.

parameters.name: ClientConfigurationVersion
parameters.description: The configuration version returned in the most recent  GetConfiguration response. For more information about working with configurations, see Retrieving feature flags and configuration data in AppConfig in the AppConfig User Guide.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the configuration or the configuration data.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: A standard MIME type describing the format of the configuration content. For more information, see Content-Type.
